form.title: Book a Free Trial Day
form.name: Name
form.submit_alert: Thank you for your interest! We will get back to you shortly.

about_us_page.title: About Us
about_us_page.subtitle: Welcome to our board game cafe! We are a cozy place for you to hang out with friends, family, or by yourself.
about_us_page.mission_text: Our mission is to create a vibrant and inclusive community for board game enthusiasts. We believe in the power of board games to bring people together, foster creativity, and create lasting memories.

hero.title: Where Focus Meets Comfort.
hero.subtitle: A cozy workspace by day. A VIP board game club by night.

comfort.title: Health-Conscious Comfort
comfort.description: Work in comfort with our ergonomic IKEA Markus chairs. We also offer 4K monitors for rent and orthopedic footrests to ensure your well-being.

wifi.title: Blazing Fast Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Stay connected with our fiber-optic internet, ensuring smooth video calls and fast downloads.

coffee.title: Artisan Coffee & Tea
coffee.description: Enjoy unlimited freshly brewed artisan coffee and a selection of premium teas to keep you energized.

atmosphere.title: Cozy & Quiet Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: Our space is designed to be a peaceful and productive environment, with quiet zones for focused work.

collection.title: Curated Game Collection
collection.description: Explore a vast and unique collection of board games, from classic strategies to the latest releases.

tables.title: Exclusive Private Tables
tables.description: Enjoy your game nights in privacy and comfort with dedicated tables for you and your friends.

tournaments.title: Thrilling Tournaments
tournaments.description: Test your skills in our regular tournaments and compete for glory and exciting prizes.

atmosphere_gallery.title: An Ambiance Crafted for You
atmosphere_gallery.description: Step into a space where thoughtful design meets ultimate comfort. Our interiors blend warm wood tones, soft ambient lighting, and plush furnishings to create an inviting atmosphere that feels both productive and deeply relaxing.

images.coworking1: A modern and cozy coworking space
images.boardGames1: A collection of board games on a shelf
images.coffeeShop1: A warm and inviting coffee shop area
images.coworking2: People working in a collaborative environment
images.boardGames2: Friends laughing while playing a board game
images.generic: A comfortable lounge area with soft lighting

pricing_page.title: Our Pricing
pricing_page.subtitle: We offer flexible pricing options to suit your needs. Whether you're here for a day of work or a month of productivity, we have a plan for you.

day_pass.title: Day Pass
day_pass.description: Perfect for a day of focused work. Includes access to all common areas and amenities.

monthly_desk.title: Monthly Desk
monthly_desk.description: Your own dedicated desk for the month. Includes 24/7 access and all the perks of our community.

meeting_room.title: Meeting Room
meeting_room.description: A private, fully-equipped room for your meetings and presentations. Seats up to 8 people.

usp.title: Big Brain USP!
usp.description: For all our coworking residents, board games are completely free in the evening!

board_games_page.title: Our Board Games
board_games_page.description_1: We have a massive collection of over 1,000 board games! From classic strategy games to the latest releases, we have something for everyone. Our library is constantly growing, so there's always something new to discover.
board_games_page.description_2: You can browse our collection online or come into the cafe to see them for yourself. Our knowledgeable staff is always on hand to help you choose the perfect game and teach you the rules.

events_page.title: Upcoming Events
events_page.subtitle: Join our community for a variety of exciting events, from epic tournaments to casual game nights. There's always something happening at Undercover Vibe!

mafia.title: Mafia Night
mafia.description: A night of deception, deduction, and fun. Can you survive?

dnd.title: D&D for Beginners
dnd.description: New to Dungeons & Dragons? Join our introductory session and start your adventure.

catan.title: Catan Tournament
catan.description: Compete with other settlers for the lordship of Catan. Prizes for the winner!

cozy.title: Cozy Game Night
cozy.description: A relaxed evening with a selection of light and fun board games.
